Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates each player's boards

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Makes 2 new 2D arrays for player and opponet boards

      • isShip

        public boolean isShip(int x,
                      int y)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        true: There is a ship in the given coordinates | false: there is no ship in the given coordinates

      • shot

        public void shot(int x,
                 int y,
                 boolean bool)
        We check shot availablity with BattleShips class's method. If it is available then we shot using this method
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate for shot
        y - y coordinate for shot
        bool - true: shot hit | false: no hit

      • placeShips

        public void placeShips(int x,
                       int y)
        Places a piece of ship on the player's board
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of a piece of ship
        y - y coordinate of a piece of ship
